thread.title: IPL Auction: Can a T20 triple century propel you straight into IPL?
thread.title_full: IPL Auction: Can a T20 triple century propel you straight into IPL?

title: IPL Auction: Can a T20 triple century propel you straight into IPL?
text:
IPL Auction: Can a T20 triple century propel you straight into IPL? IPL Auction: Can a T20 triple century propel you straight into IPL? Comments When schoolboy sensations Sachin Tendulkar and Vinod Kambli scored triple centuries and a record 600+ run partnership way back in the 1980s, Test legend Sunil Gavaskar clamoured that they be immediately taken into the Test team. 
Both were offered a place in the Mumbai Ranji team. Tendulkar grabbed the opportunity with both hands and the rest is history. (Kambli declined and took the more circuitous Under-19 route). 
In the IPL age, nothing is a given and such knocks may not get you far. Just look at Pranav Dhanawade. Despite scoring an unheard of 1000+ runs in an innings in a school tournament he failed to make it to the next stage and even got arrested as he was on a practice ground where a VVIP chopper was to land. 
By Sunil Rajguru
